long_description: The Stohlquist Rocker PFD increases your comfort on long paddles thanks to its ergonomically shaped torso. Durable Cordura(R) nylon shell resists abrasion and UV rays for long-lasting service. Cross-chest cinch strap reduces annoying ride up and keeps flotation in place; a non-slip panel on the interior further reduces ride-up. Stretchy, adjustable shoulders straps follow your movement without getting in the way. 6 points of adjustment personalize the fit. Large zippered pocket stores essentials; front 4-way lash tab lets you attach safety equipment. Hands-free expandable pocket stashes a small water bottle. Ventilated lumbar pad offers cooling airflow. Reflective accents enhance visibility.
short_description: The Stohlquist Rocker PFD increases your comfort on long paddles thanks to its ergonomically shaped torso.
